DOC.brief_summary: This multi-site , dispense , 4-visit , 2-arm parallel group , randomize , double-masked clinical trial use Vistakon investigational contact lens ( test ) market monthly replacement contact lens ( control ) . Each subject assign randomly either test control lens evaluate long term safety efficacy investigational contact lens compare market contact lens period six month lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Long-Term Evaluation Approved Investigational Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . The subject must least 18 year age . The subject 's vertex correct spherical equivalent distance refraction must range 1.00 6.00 eye . The subject 's refractive cylinder must ≤ 1.00 Diopters ( D ) eye . The subject must best correct visual acuity 20/25 good eye . The subject wearable pair spectacle bring initial visit . The subject must adapt frequent replacement daily wear spherical silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer eye . The subject must normal eye ( i.e. , ocular medication infection type ) . The subject must enrol complete visit clinical study CR5726 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . This may include , limited , diabetes , hyperthyroidism , recurrent herpes simplex/zoster , Sjögren 's syndrome , xerophthalmia , acne rosacea , StevensJohnson syndrome , immunosuppressive disease infectious disease ( e.g. , hepatitis , tuberculosis ) . Use following medication within 1 week prior enrollment : oral retinoid isotretinoin ( e.g. , Accutane ) , oral tetracycline , topical scopolamine , oral phenothiazine ( e.g . Haldol , Mellaril , Thorazine , Elavil , Pamelor , Compazine ) , oral ophthalmic Betaadrenergic blocker ( e.g. , Propranolol , Timolol , Practolol ) , systemic steroid , prescribe OTC ocular medication . Entropion , ectropion , extrusion , chalazia , recurrent stye , glaucoma , history recurrent corneal erosion , aphakia , moderate corneal distortion . Any previous , plan , ocular interocular surgery ( e.g. , radial keratotomy , photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) , laserassisted situ keratomileusis ( LASIK ) , etc . ) Any grade 3 great slit lamp finding ( e.g. , edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection ) FDA classification scale , previous history sign contact lensrelated corneal inflammatory event ( e.g. , past peripheral ulcer round peripheral scar ) , ocular abnormality may contraindicate contact lens wear . Any known hypersensitivity allergic reaction OptiFree® PureMoist® multipurpose care solution EyeCept rewetting drop solution Any ocular infection , allergy clinically significant ocular disease ( e.g. , corneal edema , uveitis , severe keratoconjunctivitis sicca , ocular hypertension ) , ocular condition ( e.g . strabismus ) , might interfere study . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . Daily disposable , extend wear , monovision multifocal contact lens correction . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . Employee relative employee sponsor investigational clinic ( e.g. , Investigator , Coordinator , Technician )
